game_description: Have you ever dreamed of being a real surgeon? Well‚Ä¶ you are not gonna learn that here. Welcome to the most unrealistic surgery simulator where everyone can instantly become a terrible doctor. You will have to solve hilarious surgical procedures ranging from CPR to brain transplant or even removing alien eggs from a poor patient using a robotic arm! You always thought you had that surgeon in you? You better have a bulletproof malpractice insurance before getting your virtual hands on a patient! Key Surgineering Tools & Abilities: ‚óè Use your hands with physics to dig in that flesh ‚óè Huge arsenal: scalpels, knives, syringes, drills, saws, rubber ducks and much more! ‚óè Defib the hell out of that patient's body. ‚óè Slap the patient's face with a fish, because why not? ‚óè Use an axe and hammer to crack down that chest and skull! ‚óè Transplant organs and limbs (even heads). ‚óè Futuristic lasers and telekinetic forceps! ‚óè Surgical Robotic Arm for very high precision procedures. Maybe.

review_3: This is a very fun game and I haven‚Äôt had any problems. Please add more levels and a sandbox mode where you can mess around with all the tools cause I completed the hole game in an hour and would like moor things to do. review_4: I play and enjoy myself until It comes to picking up objects! It glitches and won‚Äôt move. For example, whenever I pick up the syringe and try to use adrenaline, it refuses to work. It won‚Äôt suck whatever ur trying to pick up. It stays stuck. This game has no excuse for bugs at such an age and price. Please fix!
review_5: After playing the game, I can see why there are so many negative reviews, and it's at a 3.4/3.5 rating. This game feels like it is still in Alpha phase. It is so buggy and not polished at all. Between my hand constantly getting stuck on objects, objects getting stuck inside each other, tools randomly stop working, and don't work again afterwards, and the overall hand physics, grabbing things and not being able to get it positioned properly in your hand, I don't see how this game got passed to be in the Meta store. This game still needs alot of work. 100% pass till it gets polished and the bugs get fixed. Don't even get me started on the final level with the machine arm. It's janky as f*ck. Didn't even bother to complete it. I should've listened to the ratings!
